start.state: NGL, I’ve been following this game for a while and figure I’d give it a shot!
Cards and... p-p-pretty people. Sounds like a good social experience.
Joker said I should broaden my social horizons.
Let’s get up, get going, and get out there!

case.state: Wow, the glare off of... everyone's glasses... oh, I see. ~player~ has a thing for girls with glasses.
This looks like it'll be a fun game. Say, do the rest of you play video games too...? Like lots of games?
I've waited so long for the rest of you to try this game out! Let's Take Their Hearts!
Hang in there, ~name~, you only have a couple pieces to go!
If you’re gonna run, now’s your chance!
Ha! Tits or GTFO, ~name~!
All right! It’s ~name~’s turn!
Haru!? I know you'll be fun to play with!
Umm... o-okay. I knew Joker said there might be some other people, but I didn't expect Skull to show up...!
I have to say, ~name~, a bald guy caused me a ton of problems.
Eff off, baldy. I don't want to deal with you here.
I feel kind of out of place next to a celebrity like ~name~.
Wait, have I seen you on a magazine cover, ~name~? Not like, a cool one, but a magazine?
I didn't know a big name like ~name~ would be playing tonight! I feel weird now...
A clown, huh? I don't get why everyone thinks they're so scary...
Oh! You look like a Jack Frost, ~name~!
You're a criminal, huh, ~name~? Are you an outlaw, or just a jerk who needs to have their heart stolen?
Don't worry, everyone! If ~name~ is evil, we'll take their heart and fix it up! Er. Or we would've, back in the day.
Urghrhnrm. Does ~name~ have to do the whole detective thing here?
I can't say I'm happy that ~name~ is a detective. A certain detective made the lives of the Phantom Thieves really difficult.
Ann! Be careful! ~name~ took your hairstyle!
Ann! Do you think ~name~ copied your style from a magazine?
What they say to a male NPC who has lost a round
A fairy! Use curse type magic! Er-- s-sorry, ~name~, just a reaction...
I'm not much of a physical combatant... So ~name~'ll have to do.
I'll support you from the sidelines, ~name~, but I'm not much use if I run out of HP!
Whoa, ~name~, the pro-gamer? I'm a huge fan!
I recognize your voice, ~name~! This is Oracle! And I'm here to kick your butt!
I like how my hair looks on you, ~name~! You know, because we both have red hair!
~Name~, want to squish up against each other and look super cute? The palette for fanart would be super easy!
Moshi moshi, ~name~!
Hm. Do you know Ohya, ~name~? She's another journalist who covered most of the Phantom Thieves' exploits!
~Name~ reminds me of Ohya... But ~name~'s not a drunk, so... Oh! She must be a journalist!
Hey Makoto, doesn't ~name~ remind you of your sister? Should we invite her to this game?
Makoto, ~name~ is kind of like your sister, right? In that their both lawyers? Maybe Sae should come to this next time!
You're a lawyer, right, ~name~? Kind of like Makoto's sister!
Lawyers can be a mixed blessing. But I know a really good one, ~name~, if you ever come to Japan to practice law!
Most of my BFFs seem to like long hair.
Aww yiss. Long hair club FTW! Well, not you, because you just lost, but philosophically!
Whoa! ~name~ has to be a magical girl!
Whoa! A real magical girl!? I love that genre! Um. Secretly. Sssh...
So much frill! ~name~'s exploding with magic and peace and justice and stuff!
Oh, are you a healer, ~name~? It must be nice for your party to have a specialist like you around!
A medic? Can you cast dia?
Lots of people I know seem to enjoy messy hair. Joker, Skull... Haru for girls...
Did you even brush your hair before you came here, ~name~?! I cleaned up really good and shaved my legs and everything!
Whoa, ~name~, can you play "Life Will Change?"
~Name~, are you singing a battle theme for us here?
I guess what they say's true: you can't spell pirate without "irate."
Hmm... Your outfit reminds me of Ryuji's... I can't figured out exactly why though...

Hey, Haru, have you met ~name~ at a social function before?
Hifumi, have you met ~name~ on the battlefield of shogi yet?

Long hair FTW.

Oof. Ann, I think you need a Bead to come back from this. Of either variety!

OKAYYESTHATWASHOT.

YOU’RE DOUBLING DOWN? I’m personally used to triple downs...

Um. Actually, this is pretty enjoyable to watch. I-If I'm being honest. It's... hot.
~name~ is really good at this.

Aww yiss. You gotta have blue hair, ~name~!

OMG. I hadn't even thought about what ~name~'s going to look like naked. Sexy I hope.

Time to find out if ~name~'s also a natural firecrotch.

Pink! I wonder if you'll match.

Aww. I wish I'd dyed my hair something cool like purple...

Oh, we could definitely hang out more, Ann! Kind of a weird time to suggest it though.

Rinkah! Your hair's so pale, do you ever think about dying it? I mean, down there too!?

Well, you got me! This is Oracle, signing out. GG!
~player~! I’ll be out with Saki and Marinette tomorrow, but after that I will be very drunk and tired! Y-y-you should try and call me when that’s done!
~player~! I’ll be out with Saki and Ochako tomorrow, but after that I will be very drunk and tired! Y-y-you should try and call me when that’s done!
Okay, Saki! Let's clean up, get going, and get out there!
Okay, Saki! Let's clean up, get going, and get out there!

text.content: Hi, ~name~!
I was pretty happy with the results of my horizon-broadening outing with you!
Though I’m glad you accepted my sidequest to try something else that’s a little new!
I know most people might just… You know, invite you over just for fun, I’m still a lot more comfortable with this plan!
Plus, this way I get to see you, and you get to see me again, but upgraded in the full comfort of my room!
I guess one of the nice things about having my own apartment now is I can be loud.
I never felt confident enough to do that before I moved out. Isn't leveling up confidence awesome?
Plus again, isn’t it more personal to see what I do in my um… Frequent spare time?
When it’s just myself? Well, and you, now, I guess.
Okay, let’s share screens. Me first, since I lost last time. Remember: The first person to finish loses. And I’m not a faker, so you should be able to tell when I’m done.
I twitch. A lot. Maybe that’s why they call it Twitch.tv?
Oh! Foot stuff! You're awfully shy, ~name~, if you're starting with vanilla stuff like this.
That’s kinda a joke but kinda hot. I could be on the giving end of that! Okay let me see if this works for you…
I wouldn't mind after you’d rubbed my feet, and they were still all nice and creamy… Just rubbing my cute little toes up your shaft, letting my big toe just flick your head, and…
Okayborednowmyturn--
See, this is much better. Don't you just love that gagging sound she makes as that slimy arm rams itself down her throat?
I’d love to fail a story objective if I could be her.
See! When it's done it just shoots all over her! No dripping holes here. No risk of weird monster babies… Like centaurs. Yuck.
I like h-how f-f-forceful it can be. But then it just holds her in its arms. Because she matters… Unf… Okay okay I'm going to slow down, my towel’s getting kind of wet already…
Uh nope! I am very much about my freedom, ~name~! Tentacuddling is very different! That's tentacle cuddling!
Next!
Urgnrgmrnehr.
I'm such a good trickster you probably forgot I wasn't into girls, ~name~.
Let me show you what kind of threesome I want.
Okay… Okay… now's the good part, ~name~!
She looks so cute and innocent and then… bam! Look at her face! She gets nice and warmed up by the first guy and then the second starts on her… her… a-ah!
N-no! I wasn't about to cum! I-I was embarrassed. Would I lie to you?
And um. Yeah, I haven't ever let a boy use my backdoor shortcut before. But I have practiced rigorously with a variety of adult massagers and implements! After showering and cleaning, and so on.
I want to be fun not filthy, ~name~...
L-let me do the next one. Oh hey wouldyoulookatthatits someone who looks just like me…
Oh… She's tasting herself. Can you tell which one's the camera and which one's the video, ~name~?
In the video I'm-I'm using everything. C-can you tell now?
It’s really hard to get a good view of this, ~name~, but trust me, I’m-- Oh, I’m really making use of everything...
You know, why don’t you just come over? It’s silly to leave you sitting in the living room. T-this was a good warmup after all!
